summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PubProcess Quality Assessment features. All 14 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI tests verified the 6-step submission form with new Quality Assessment step (Step 5) containing 4 new fields. Quality indices are returned by the API when demo_mode is enabled.

issues: New quality_indices (average_review_quality, feedback_clarity_index, decision_fairness_index, recommendation_index) are returned by API but not yet displayed in the Analytics UI. This may be intentional for future release.

GET /api/options/feedback-clarity-scale returns 1-5 scale with labels (Very Unclear to Very Clear)
GET /api/options/decision-fairness returns agree/neutral/disagree options
GET /api/options/would-recommend returns yes/neutral/no options
Analytics overview includes quality_indices when demo_mode enabled
average_review_quality index has correct structure (value, scale, description)
feedback_clarity_index has correct structure
decision_fairness_index has correct structure with distribution
recommendation_index has correct structure with distribution
Submission endpoint accepts new quality fields (overall_review_quality, feedback_clarity, decision_fairness, would_recommend)
valid_for_stats validation detects duplicates within 30 days
Visibility message in user_only mode uses Portuguese institutional tone
Visibility message in threshold_based mode works correctly
Sample data has all new quality assessment fields populated (500 submissions)
Submission form shows 6 steps (Step 5 is Quality Assessment)
Step 5 displays Overall Review Quality with 1-5 star rating
Step 5 displays Feedback Clarity with 5 options

Step 6 is Evidence Upload with Submit button
